goal:
As one of the early innovators in the field of precise positioning, VERIPOS aims to be the market leader in precise navigation and positioning solutions, through the innovative application of technology, continuous product development and operational excellence.

Our products and services, which include comprehensive training programmes, are widely used by professionals in key areas of the offshore industry – including Seismic Exploration, Survey & Construction, DP Marine and DP Drilling - and the onshore industry, particularly in agriculture and surveying.

We are totally focused on the success of our clients to whom we aim to be not just a supplier, but a partner for positioning.

We can achieve accuracy levels that cannot be beaten by any other service – down to 10cm for vessels working in some of the harshest environments on earth.

We operate, maintain and control our own network of over 80 GNSS reference stations to ensure maximum operational reliability.

Fully redundant, diverse Network Control Centres supply data for two or more independent satellite beams in each region of the world.
euInitiatives: VERIPOS is a member of the Galileo Services Organisation, which aims to highlight the need for development of downstream GNSS applications and services.
